# DataTables
Jan-Philipp Kolb  
27 Januar 2017  



## The R-package DT

- [DT: An R interface to the DataTables library](https://rstudio.github.io/DT/)


```r
# install.packages('DT')
library('DT')
```

```
## Warning: package 'DT' was built under R version 3.3.2
```


```r
exdat <- read.csv("data/exdat.csv")
```


```r
datatable(exdat)
```
